name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 1822 Loco Add-On
summary: Built in the early 1990s, the ÖBB 1822 was designed as a mixed-traffic locomotive specifically for conquering the challenging Brenner Pass, as well as being able to be used on both Austria’s and Italy's differing electrification systems. Experience the stylish ÖBB 1822 from RSSLO in Train Simulator!
